patthana15.47:4.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.47:5.1: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
